argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pwssplit1.y | |- Y = ( W ^s U ) |
| 2 |  | pwssplit1.z | |- Z = ( W ^s V ) |
| 3 |  | pwssplit1.b | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 4 |  | pwssplit1.c | |- C = ( Base ` Z ) |
| 5 |  | pwssplit1.f | |- F = ( x e. B |-> ( x |` V ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 7 | 1, 6, 3 | #P_pwselbasb | |- ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X ) -> ( x e. B <-> x : U --> ( Base ` W ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) -> ( x e. B <-> x : U --> ( Base ` W ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_biimpa | |- ( ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) /\ x e. B ) -> x : U --> ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpl3 | |- ( ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) /\ x e. B ) -> V C_ U ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_fssresd | |- ( ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) /\ x e. B ) -> ( x |` V ) : V --> ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) -> W e. T ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) -> U e. X ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) -> V C_ U ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_ssexd | |- ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) -> V e. _V ) |
| 16 | 2, 6, 4 | #P_pwselbasb | |- ( ( W e. T /\ V e. _V ) -> ( ( x |` V ) e. C <-> ( x |` V ) : V --> ( Base ` W ) ) ) |
| 17 | 12, 15, 16 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) -> ( ( x |` V ) e. C <-> ( x |` V ) : V --> ( Base ` W ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) /\ x e. B ) -> ( ( x |` V ) e. C <-> ( x |` V ) : V --> ( Base ` W ) ) ) |
| 19 | 11, 18 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) /\ x e. B ) -> ( x |` V ) e. C ) |
| 20 | 19, 5 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ( W e. T /\ U e. X /\ V C_ U ) -> F : B --> C ) |
